MA.name: MA
MA.desc: Buy rule: price must be above its n-week moving average (uptrend confirmation)

DROP.name: DROP
DROP.desc: Buy rule: spread must drop this % from its 4-week peak before re-entering

CHG4.name: CHG4
CHG4.desc: Sell rule: sell if 4-week credit spread change exceeds this % threshold

RET3.name: RET3
RET3.desc: Sell rule: sell if 3-week price return falls below this % threshold

SPREAD_LVL.name: SPREAD_LVL
SPREAD_LVL.desc: Sell rule: sell if absolute credit spread level exceeds this threshold
